lines.text: Any fool with a dick can make a baby, but only a real man can raise his children.
Ho's gotta eat too.
Who you callin' a ho', I ain't no ho'.
Oops, I'm sorry, bitch.
Why is it that there is a gun shop on almost every corner in this community?
Why?
I'll tell you why. For the same reason that there is a liquor store on almost every corner in the black community. Why? They want us to kill ourselves.
[Tre answers the phone]
Who dis?
Who dis? What kind of way is that to answer the phone? Have you given anymore thought to what we talked about?
Yeah... I don't know yet.
Let me speak to yo daddy.
POP! Telephone.
Who dis?
Something wrong?
Something wrong? Yeah. It's just too bad you don't know what it is... *Brother*.
Fool you don't go to college to be talkin' to no bitches. Your black ass 'posed to be learnin' somethin'. Can't learn shit talkin' to no stupid ass bitch.
Yeah, I heard you been gettin' that dope-head pussy. See, me, I probably get more pussy than you get air with yo' wannabe macdaddy ass.
You don't know what I be getting. I don't be fucking no dopeheads. I let them suck my dick. Shit, they got AIDS and shit.
Stupid motherfucker, don't you know you can catch that shit from letting them suck on your dick?
Thank you.
See. I ain't sick. I ain't all skinny and shit.
Nigga, what you mean you ain't skinny. Motherfucker so skinny, he can hula hoop through a Cheerio. And you ain't got to be skinny or sick, you can die five years from now from that shit.
Y'all just trying to scare me... for real, can you really die from lettin em suck on yo dick?
Mark.
Rick, it's the Nineties. Can't afford to be afraid of our own people anymore, man.
[last lines]
Hey, Dough!
W'sup?
You still got one brother left, man.
Thanks, man... Later, G.
Later.
Fool, I wasn't even talking to you. This is a A-B conversation, you know... you can "C" your way out of it.
Yeah, you can "C" your way out my ride, and we'll "C" your cripple ass walking all the way home.
[Furious has shot at a burglar]
Somebody must have been praying for that fool, cause I swear I aimed right for his head.
You should have blew it off.
Don't say that. Don't say that. Just would've contributed to the killing of another brother.
Now I want you to give me the gun.
[Tre does not hand the gun to his father]
Oh, I get it, you gonna end like Doughboy... like little Chris in a wheelchair.
[Tre still doesn't respond]
GIVE ME THE MOTHERFUCKING GUN, TRE.
[complaining about TV news coverage]
Either they don't know, don't show, or don't care about what's going on in the hood. They had all this foreign shit. They didn't have shit on my brother, man.
I didn't do nothing.
You think you tough?
[pulls gun on Tre]

Scared now, ain't you? I like that. That's why I took this job. I hate little motherfuckers like you. Little niggers, you ain't shit! I could blow your head off with this Smith & Wesson and you couldn't do shit. Think you tough? What set you from? Look like one of them Crenshaw mafia motherfuckers.

Yo, cuz, I know why you got outta the car last night... shouldn't have been there in the first place. You don't want that shit to come back to haunt you. I ain't been up this early in a long time. I turned on the TV this morning, they had this shit on about... about living in a violent world. Showed all these foreign places... I started thinking, man, either they don't know, don't show, or don't care about what's going on in the hood. Man, all this foreign shit, and they didn't have shit on my brother, man.
[sniffles]
I ain't got no brother. Got no mother, either. She loved that fool more than she loved me.

[running up to the porch]
Doughboy! You got some blow? Got some rock?
Yo, get the fuck out my face! Keep them goddamn babies out the street!

[Sheryl leaves]
Did y'all get 'em?

[wipes his eyes and looks at Tre. Tre shakes his head]
I'ont even know how I feel about it, neither, man. It just goes on and on, you know. Next thing you know, somebody might try and smoke me. Don't matter, doe. We all gotta go sometime, huh?

[knocking on Sheryl's door]
Sheryl! Come on!
[Sheryl enters]
Keep your baby off the street. She gonna get hit one of these days.
You got some blow? You got some rock? I'll suck your dick.
Just keep the baby off the streets! And change her diapers! They almost smell as bad as you.
Hey D, why don't you go to the store for me.
Nigga, I ain't the one she told to go get it, its yo wife.
Look man, she ain't my wife.
She may as well be, Y'all got a family and all.
Why is it every time you talk about a female you gotta say bitch, ho, or hootchie?
'Cause that's what you are.
Man your pops is like, mothafuckin, Malcolm... Farrakhan.
[Doughboy kicks Ferris in his bullet-ridden legs]
Fuck you man! Fuck you!
Turn your punk-ass over!
I didn't do it man! I didn't pull the fuckin' trigger! What the fuck you doin? Oh, man! Well, fuck you! Fuck you!
[Doughboy shoots Ferris twice]

[referring to drug epidemic]
I know every time you turn on the TV thats what you see, Black People, sellin the rock, pushin the rock, pushin the rock, yeah I know. But that wasn't a problem as long as it was here
[referring to Compton, Watts, other Black ghettos]
. It wasn't a problem until it was in Iowa on Wall Street where there are hardly any black people.
I get a discount on clothes, and shit. You like?
Nigga, you look like you selling rocks!
Yo, Tre' you be slinging that shit?
No, I don't sell that shit!
You couldn't anyway! Pops will kick yo' ass! You know I'm out the pen. I'm gon' keep my ass out this time.
That's what we're here to celebrate, right? Damn, brother how did you get so big?
Pumping iron, and eating. Ain't nothing else to do in the motherfucking pen. Three hots, and a cot, know what I'm saying? I was also reading, and writing my girl.
You read?
Yeah nigga, I ain't no criminal! I can read, bitch!
Don't y'all know that this is a dead body?
Yeah, motherfucker, we know that shit. He ain't bothering you, so don't fuck with him.

[scratching lotto ticket]
damn, nothin.
what?
Nothin, I said I didn't win nothin.
You gotta be mexican to win that shit.

[laughing after he breaks down in tears]
I never thought I'd be crying in front of a female.
You can cry in front of me.
Domino, motherfucker!
We got a problem here? We got a problem, nigga?
[Ferris and gang take a step back]
Put the gun away, nigga.
Can we have one night where there ain't no fightin'; nobody gets shot?
Shut up, bitch!
Ain't nobody from outside bringing down the property value. It's these folk, shootin' each other and sellin' that crack rock and shit.
Well, how you think the crack rock gets into the country? We don't own any planes. We don't own no ships. We are not the people who are flyin' and floatin' that shit in here.
I tell y'all where y'all need to go, where they got more women than anywhere. Violence too.
Crenshaw Sunday Nights?
no.
Street racers on Florence?
Nah, nigga, y'all way off!
Everybody's been there
where?
Where nigga, spit it out!
The Church.
Aw Shit! Nigga please! Ain't nobody going to church to catch no bitches. I should blow your ass and bump this porch with that stupid shit!
You ain't shit. You just like your daddy. You don't do shit, and you never gonna amount to shit. All you do is eat, sleep, and shit.
Turn your punk ass over!
What'd you use?
I used the number she gave me... Why you sweating me? I didn't have to use nothing. She said she was on the pill.

How many times do I have I told you, if a girl says she's on the pill, you use somethin anyway. Pill ain't goin' to keep your dick from falling off. I don't know why you insist on learning things the hard way, but you gon' learn. Oh yeah, you gon' learn. Pick up that hair.
Who;s dat?
Dat's my lady, homie. Her name is Brandi.
Man, she ain't your woman. She my woman.
How can she be yo' woman when she my lady?
She my wife.
She may be your wife but I stick my ding-a-ling in her every night, so that makes her mine.
Punk!
Faggot!
Get off me wit yo' big 4 by 4 head!
Life would be different if God was a bitch.
Man, what the fuck is wrong with you?
What?
You're slamming my door like some kind of Gorilla on a football field!
Damn, Nigger! What's wrong with you?
Nothing.
Fuck you looking at, nigga?
I'm still trying to find out,
[shouts]
Nigga!
What? We got a problem here?
[shows gun]
We got a problem?
[after all the men shove their way past the women to get to the food first]
Hey, hey! Why don't you all act like gentlemen and let these ladies eat first.
[He motions to Doughboy for assistance]
Yeah. Y'all act like you ain't never had no barbecue before. The ladies eat. Ho's gotta eat too.
Wait a minute, niggah, who you callin' a ho? I ain't no ho!
Oh, I'm sorry bitch.

[She smacks Doughboy]
Hey, hey! Watch your mouth.
I'm just playin'!
You know how to play Spades, Dooky?
Somethin' like that.
I got somethin' for you to suck on.
How do you know God's a he? He can be a she. You don't know that.
I heard you like Mr. GQ Smooth now. You working over at the Fox Hills Mall?
Yeah, I get discounts on clothes. You like?
You look like you sellin' rocks.
I tell you where y'all need to go, where they got more women than anywhere, fine ones too.
Crenshaw on Sunday Nights?
Nope.
Street racers on Flourence?
Nah, nigga, y'all way off!
Everybody's been there.
where?
Where nigga, spit it out!
Church.
ain't nobody going to church to catch no bitches. I should roll your ass up off this porch with that stupid shit!
